assets.prompt: Wide-angle gravel road disappearing into rolling hills at golden hour, muted earth tones with warm amber light, dust particles in air, no people, cinematic landscape photography style
Aerial view of a winding gravel road through open prairie with distant mountains, race start banner barely visible, morning light with long shadows, topographic map aesthetic
Close-up of a cyclist's legs pedaling on a gravel surface, power meter visible on crank arm, teal and brown earth tones, shallow depth of field, training intensity feel
Gravel cyclist descending a fast dirt road in a tucked position, dust trail behind, dramatic side lighting, motion blur on wheels, power and precision aesthetic
Flat lay of gravel cycling nutrition essentials on a dark wood surface: energy gels, electrolyte bottles, rice cakes, dates, bananas, arranged in organized grid, moody top-down photography
Silhouette of a lone gravel cyclist on a ridge at dawn, vast empty landscape, contemplative mood, muted teal sky fading to warm earth tones at horizon
Organized bike workshop scene: gravel bike on stand with tools laid out methodically, checklist clipboard, dim garage lighting with warm accent light, pre-race preparation aesthetic
Gravel bike leaning against a fence post at sunset after a ride, water bottle half-empty, dusty frame, golden light, peaceful exhaustion, recovery mood

Clean infographic showing gravel cycling gear essentials in a grid layout: bike frame, tires (40-50mm), helmet, repair kit, hydration pack. Minimal style with black borders, monospace labels, brown and teal accent colors on off-white background

Pyramid infographic showing hierarchy of speed factors in gravel racing. From bottom (largest): Engine/Fitness, then Nutrition/Fueling, then Pacing, then Equipment, then Tactics at top (smallest). Neo-brutalist style with black borders, monospace font, teal and brown fills

Radar chart or grid showing 14 scoring dimensions for gravel race rating: distance, elevation, technical difficulty, navigation, prestige, field size, prize money, scenic value, logistics, community, safety, course marking, aid stations, overall production. Clean data visualization, monospace labels, teal accent bars on off-white

Horizontal bar chart showing 7 training zones from Z1 Active Recovery to Z7 Neuromuscular, with power percentage ranges and heart rate ranges. Color gradient from teal (easy) through gold (threshold) to deep brown (max). Neo-brutalist style, monospace labels, black borders

Timeline infographic showing 12-week gravel training periodization: Base Phase (weeks 1-4), Build Phase (weeks 5-8), Peak/Taper Phase (weeks 9-12). Each phase shows volume and intensity curves. Neo-brutalist style with black borders, teal for volume, gold for intensity, monospace labels

Timeline infographic showing race-day fueling strategy: pre-race meal (3hrs before), pre-start gel (15min before), hourly fueling targets (60-90g carbs/hr), hydration targets (500-750ml/hr). Clean horizontal timeline, monospace labels, teal and gold accents, neo-brutalist black borders

Three-panel infographic showing the three acts of a long gravel race: Act 1 Restraint (0-33%, cool teal), Act 2 Resilience (33-66%, warm gold), Act 3 Resolve (66-100%, deep brown). Each panel has key mental strategies listed. Neo-brutalist style, monospace font, thick black borders

Countdown calendar infographic showing race week protocol days 7 to 1: each day shows key tasks (training taper, nutrition loading, equipment check, sleep targets). Vertical timeline with daily cards, neo-brutalist style, monospace font, alternating teal and brown accents
